title: Live from MaxFunCon!
description:
Al Letson, Beowulf Jones and Jordan Morris share stories at Lake Arrowhead for our parent network's weekend-long fanjets, MaxFunCon!

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Jordan Morris, Grouplove, Al Letson, Beowulf Jones, Bacalao, Kevin Allison, Genesis)
